Articles.Content:
i recognise a few people from orbiter (even excluding HarvestR), but this is a whole new community over here!

this game looks pretty epic for a free game, my top-end-office-comp/low-end-gaming comp struggles a little (possibly due to multi-core issues?)

orbital mechanics is second nature to me, due to my time in Orbiter space sim (This is NOT a plug), but ive learned even more here thanks to the map view (watching your orbit propagate between two bodies in 3D is a whole new thing for me)

hopefully ill manage to land on the Mun eventually, though i can get to orbit easily enough, making a craft capable of landing there is another matter

see ya round the orbit guys!

Welcome to the forums and best of luck with the Mun.

Remember to kill horizontal velocity before landing!

Remember to kill horizontal velocity before landing!

nah, its more fun the other way.... wait, this game has lunar terrain... this may be a problem

nah, its more fun the other way.... wait, this game has lunar terrain... this may be a problem

Yeah, Mun mountains tend to turn up at the worst moments!

My \'where the heck did that come from?!\' moment:

http://fryzbe.deviantart.com/#/d4fa5ah

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
